item.title: Mark Bernes – Dark Is the Night (Тёмная ночь)
item.description: Lyrics and explanation The song has its own page on Wikipedia. See Dark Is the Night (Soviet song) and the Russian version . Check Soundtimes.ru for a brief history and interesting facts. Definitely watch Songs from the film “Two Soldiers” performed by Mark Bernes (Первая Столица, 2015, 9 m).
